TopicTitle: Error message after update : "Failed to initialize player...."

Articles.Content:
So I tried to update KSP and until now i had no issues. Everytime I try to launch KSP, it flat out won't load and everytime I am getting the following error message. I've tried rebooting and launching as administrator. Neither of which help.

The error message I am getting

Anyone encountered this before?
Never heard of it whatsoever... At best, I'd guess some game files got corrupted somewhere; you may have to redownload KSP from the Store.

Try creating a fresh install.

This looks like you've got bad game data somewhere.

If you want to keep your game saves, back them up, then you can restore them to the new install.
